title: Coffee Bloom
plot: Dev, though a self proclaimed wise man, finds comfort in being a loser, having given up on life as a result of a love gone wrong. A life changing event takes him on a journey to a coffee plantation.

Dev sells his family coffee estate as a statement underlining his renunciation of the world. When his mother dies heartbroken, he vows to prove worthy of her before scattering her ashes, little realizing that that involves confronting the world he shunned and his turbulent past.

Having forced his mom to sell their ancestral coffee estate in spite of her reluctance, Dev feels extremely bad when she dies heartbroken that he preserves her ashes and vows to get the estate back to prove his worth. However, complications arise when he finds that the current owner of the estate is his former-lover, Anika who is now married and living at the estate with her exuberant husband.::PipingHotViews
